title: Gallery Talk: Interpreting The Maid by Carissa Rodriguez
title_display: Gallery Talk: Interpreting The Maid by Carissa Rodriguez
hero_caption: Carissa Rodriguez. Still from The Maid, 2018. © Carissa Rodriguez. Courtesy of the artist and Karma International, Zurich/Los Angeles.
short_description: Join educator Nenette Luarca-Shoaf for a conversation about The Maid, a film by contemporary artist Carissa Rodriguez. To inform our discussion, we’ll read the short story by Robert Walser that inspired the artwork and view the film in its entirety.
description:
Join educator Nenette Luarca-Shoaf for a conversation about The Maid, a film by contemporary artist Carissa Rodriguez. To inform our discussion, we’ll read the short story by Robert Walser that inspired the artwork and view the film in its entirety.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
buy_button_caption: Free with museum admission, no registration required
